Package com.bumptech.glide.loader.bitmap

Interface Summary
BitmapLoadFactory<T> An interface for providing a BitmapLoad to load a bitmap for a given model, width, and height.
 

Class Summary
ImageVideoBitmapLoadFactory<T,Y,Z> A base BitmapLoadFactory that composes ModelLoader and BitmapDecoder sub-components to create an BitmapLoad capable of loading a model that represents either an image or a video.
ResourceBitmapLoadFactory<T,Y>
